Summary: i saw 2 green blink lights hovering above route 78 near straustown PA, they then vanished abruptly
divs: Sighting Detailsi saw 2 green blinking lights hovering about 500-1000ft above route 78 near straustown PA. i watched them for about 90 secs then as i was approaching the area that seemed to be directly below them the lights vanished. i drive this way home every night and have never seen green lights in the sky. im not sure ive ever seen green lights used on any tower. i initially thought it was a plane but then i realized they werent moving. ive been following ufology for several years and have never once actually had a siting of my own. im about 90% shore that has changed tonight.
trends: There have been no other sightings in straustown
This sighting has never been favorited.
